ygData.subject: RE: Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever (long, possibly rant ish)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, luckily mine was trapped by windows :P I sent them the box with all the register and module info, we ll see if I ever hear anything back. Kitasi ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, luckily mine was trapped by windows :P
I sent them the box with all the register and module info, we'll see if I
ever hear anything back.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 12:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever
(long, possibly rant ish)


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> No but they are looking to perfect the art it seems. I got killed after a
> page fault in EQGame.exe dumped me to windows in the middle of a fight.
The

The last patch has force exited my client 8 times during the last
week. One time it happened 3 times in a row. Click, click. Boom.
Desktop. [insert foul language here] Accept, Esc, Esc, Esc, passwd,
Innoruuk, click, select Harmonic, Enter Game, [theme music] ..pause..
Click, click. [video sync from 640x480 back to 800x600] Desktop
again. This is absolute bullshit. Luckily I wasn't fighting anything
any of the times it happened. The main executable for EQ has some
very poor error trapping. There's zip, nada, zero in the dbg.txt

wtg Verant!

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
